title: Mitch McConnell will only be considered a white, Christian, governor, and a male Supreme Court judge?
subtitle: A false news story claimed that the majority leader of the Senate, Mitch McConnell, would only consider approving a Supreme Court judge who is white, Christian, conservative, and male.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Mitch McConnell will only think about approving a Supreme Court judge who is white, Christian, conservative and male.
